description: Squarefree n such that sigma(phi(n)) = phi(sigma(n)).
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
mathematica: Select[ Range[ 10^7 ], DivisorSigma[ 1, EulerPhi[ # ] ] == EulerPhi[ DivisorSigma[ 1, # ] ] && Union[ Transpose[ FactorInteger[ # ] ] [ [ 2 ] ] ] == {1} & ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 26 2000
